extension.name: Light Blog
extension.author: JooThemes.net
extension.description:
Light Blog Free Joomla! 3 Responsive Template

Light Blog Free Joomla! 3 Responsive Template developed by JooThemes.net.
Need help to set up your template? Check out the Joothemes.net Support page.
Download our Free Joomla templates.
See and buy our Joomla Templates Premium Versions.
Copyright © 2015 JooThemes.net - All Rights Reserved.

Package tpl-lightblog-free-rwd-j3.zip
Light Blog Free Joomla! 3 Responsive Template - June 2015
Version 1.0
License: Commercial Design & Layout
Author: http://JooThemes.net
Copyright (C) 2015 JooThemes.net All Rights Reserved.
Email: contact@JooThemes.net

Footer link remove license

Light Blog is free Joomla 3 template, released under the Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 license and are redistributed as long, as you keep the our links back on the footer.

You CAN NOT remove (or unreadable) these links without our permission.

When you don't want to have link back on the template footer or want to use our templates for commercial websites, you have to pay $ 10 USD via PayPal.

When you don't want to have backlinks on the template footer, you have to pay $ 10 USD via PayPal.

Paypal: contact@joothemes.net

GPL Licensing

All JooThemes.net templates are released under the GNU General Public License, version 2 (http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html). Specifically, the PHP code portions are distributed under the GPL license. If not otherwise stated, all images, manuals, cascading style sheets, and included JavaScript are NOT GPL, and are released under "JooThemes.net" Proprietary Use License" unless specifically authorized. Elements of the templates released under this proprietary license may not be redistributed or repackaged for use other than those allowed by the Terms of Use.

Buy Light Blog Quickstart Instalation Package

What is quickstart package?

"Quickstart Package" is a Light Blog Template + Joomla 3 + all content, all modules, all components and settings used in demo site.

How to install Quickstart package?

Quickstart Package install exactly the same as a normal Joomla! installation package. (To get know more about technical requirements to run Joomla! please visit: Joomla technical requirements).

TEMPLATE FEATURES

Light Blog Free Responsive Joomla! 3 template is based on the Bootstrap Framework. The Bootstrap Framework makes it fully responsive to all screen resolutions and aspect ratios.

  • Joomla! 3.x compatible.
  • Based on Bootstrap. One framework, every device. Bootstrap easily and efficiently scales your Joomla websites with a single code base, from phones to tablets to desktops with CSS media queries.
  • Responsive Mobile-Friendly template for all Joomla 3.x. A responsive layout automatically adapts to the viewing device, allowing for an optimized appearance on multiple devices, such as tablets.
  • Template Bundle Package.
  • CSS Superfish multi level dropdown menu.
  • Responsive Menu.
  • FlexSlider - an awesome, fully responsive jQuery slider!
  • jComments support and jComment theme (available only with Qucikstart Package).
  • Gallery plugin and modules (available in Qucikstart Package) 
  • Joomla news module display latest news (Joomla Articles or K2) with full control over all elements (available only with Qucikstart Package).
  • Client Logos Scroller module, it's allow you can put your client into a folder at your server and it will display your client's logo as scroller. (Client Logos Scroller module available only in Qucikstart Package)
  • Google Map module (available only in Qucikstart Package).
  • Tableless design and 100% CSS based.
  • Lightweight and fast-loading.
  • Logo as Text or Image with configuration parameters.
  • Built-in 650+ Google Fonts (available only with Qucikstart Package).
  • Built-in 30+ social media icons for the popular social networking sites including Twitter, Facebook, Google Plus, Youtube, LinkedIn and more...
  • 4 layout options: 3 columns (left+component+right), 2 columns (left+component), 2 columns (component + right), 1 column (component).
  • 11 Possible Module Positions. All module positions are fully collapsible
  • Support for Sitemap - Xmap component.
  • Cross-Browser Support - Light Blog template work great with all modern browsers like Firefox, Chrome, Safari, Opera and Internet Explorer 9+.
  • SEF Optimised Layout.
  • Heading: h1, h2, h3, h4 and h5.
  • Optimized code for Search Engines which helps in SEO.
  • SEO Breadcrumbs with Microdata Google - this will give a nice category-display in the Google search results.
  • Full quickstart installation package with Joomla 3.4.3.

    What is quickstart package? - "Quickstart Package" is a LIGHT BLOG Template + Joomla 3.4.3 + all content, all modules, all components and settings used in demo site.

    How to install Quickstart package?
    Quickstart Package install exactly the same as a normal Joomla! installation package. (To get know more about technical requirements to run Joomla! please visit: Joomla technical requirements).

  • Quickstart Package Extra Extensions (Components, Modules, Plugin) Included.
  • Automatic Slideshow. FlexSlider - an awesome, fully responsive jQuery slider. Supported in all major browsers. Horizontal/vertical slide and fade animations.  Hardware accelerated touch swipe support. Custom navigation options.
  • Gallery plugin & module - Sigplus Gallery (Sigplus Image Gallery Plus is a straightforward way to add image or photo galleries to a Joomla article with a simple syntax. It takes a matter of minutes to set up a gallery but those who are looking for a powerful gallery solution will not be disappointed either: sigplus is suitable for both beginner and advanced users.
  • Joomla news module display latest news (Joomla Articles or K2) with full control over all elements (available only with Qucikstart Package).
  • mapX - the best sitemap component. mapX is a the best site map generator component for Joomla CMS. mapX allows you to create a map of your site based on the structure of your menus. mapX is the most popular site map generator for Joomla since it was launched back in 2008 by Guillermo Vargas as Xmap.
  • JCE editor - the best WYSiWYG editor for Joomla!
  • jComments component and jComments LIGHT BLOG theme. The JComments allows to website visitors to leave comments to any published materials. It provides the flexible system of access rights settings, wide possibilities of custom view setting, uses the AJAX technology and provides many other features.
  • Client Logos Scroller module, it's allow you can put your client into a folder at your server and it will display your client's logo as scroller.
  • Extra SEO SEF plugins automatically generates description meta tags by pulling text from the content to help with SEO. It also gives you the ability to set different title configurations.
  • Extra Cache plugin.
  • And more...

Qucikstart Package - Buy Now (only 15 USD)

More information on http://JooThemes.net

Light Blog Free RWD Joomla template modules positions:

field.name: jquery
field.label: jQuery
field.description: Enable or disable jQuery latest version.

field.name: scrolltop
field.label: Back to Top Button
field.description: Enable or disable Back to Top button. This requires jQuery plugin.

field.name: superfish
field.label: Superfish Menu Effect
field.description: Enable or disable Supperfish effect for main navigation menu. This requires jQuery plugin.

field.name: logotype
field.label: Logo Type
field.description: Choose the type of the logo you want to display.

field.name: logo
field.label: Logo Image
field.description: Please choose an image. If you want to display the original logo from the template, click on Clear and leave the field blank.

field.name: sitetitle
field.label: Logo Text
field.description: Please add your site title here, it's only displayed if you don't use a the text logo option.

field.name: sitedesc
field.label: Site Description
field.description: Add your site's description here. Leave it blank to disable.

field.name: googleFontBody
field.label: Choose Google Font mainbody text
field.description: You change the font for main text body.

field.name: googleFont
field.label: Choose Google Font
field.description: You change the font for headers and main menu.

field.name: googleFontCharacter
field.label: Choose the character sets you want:
field.description: You can use (one or more, each separated by commas): latin,latin-ext,cyrillic,cyrillic-ext,greek,greek-ext,vietnamese,khmer,devanagari. IMPORTANT! If you are not sure if the font supports your language, refer to https://www.google.com/fonts.

field.name: googleFontWeight
field.label: Font weight:
field.description: You can use (one or more, each separated by commas): 300,400,700. IMPORTANT! If you are not sure if the font supports weight, refer to https://www.google.com/fonts.

field.label: More Google Fonts (650+) available in QUICKSTART LIGHT BLOG Template.

field.name: analyticsCode
field.label: Here paste your Google Analytics code:
field.description: Here paste your Google Analytics code

field.name: menuid
field.label: Show/Hide Slideshow
field.description: Select Menu where to show the slideshow

field.name: animation
field.label: Slideshow Animation
field.description: Choose the animation type for the slideshow

field.name: Link1
field.label: Link 1
field.description: URL where the slider image will link.

field.name: Caption1
field.label: Caption 1
field.description: Add image caption here. HTML allowed.
